New Records: Rohit Sharma broke Sachin Tendulkar's record for the most hundreds in the World Cup with his century.
Jasprit Bumrah took 4 wickets for 39 runs in the match.
Key Match Events: India won the match by 8 wickets with 90 balls remaining.
Rohit Sharma scored a century in 27 balls, the fastest by an Indian at the World Cup.
Afghanistan's total of 272 was achieved with a 121-run partnership between Shahidi and Omarzai.
Post-Match Reflections: Rohit Sharma's performance was a key factor in India's win.
India dominated the chase after a disciplined bowling performance.
Afghanistan's inability to reach 300 proved costly.
Miscellaneous Highlights: The match was one of the closer encounters in the 2019 World Cup but resulted in a different outcome in 2023.
